name: Manokaran
paragraph: A seasoned professional with 6 months of experience in the telecom field, now transitioning into software development. I bring project-based experience in web technologies, databases, and API development. Proficient in React-Js and Java, I have a knack for problem-solving and a strong understanding of Agile methodologies and Git version control. My telecom background adds a unique perspective to my software development skills.
